# Review of methods for analyzing censored antibody data

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

We will conduct a literature review to find literature on how censored
immunological measurements have historically been treated by statisticians.
We will identify practically useful models, and compare those with our
preferred parametric modeling strategy.
